bug.author: Jeffwan
bug.summary: Missing plugin: aws set aws plugin defaults error
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: <denchmark-code>kfctl apply -V -f ${CONFIG} INFO[0000] Downloading /tmp/kfctl_aws.yaml to /var/folders/7z/9cx2bbsd3q3352bd8b01j_nmzx5lm9/T/564625102/app.yaml filename="configconverters/converters.go:54" INFO[0000] converting to kfconfig, appdir=/Users/shjiaxin/Downloads/kf07/kf07 filename="configconverters/v1alpha1.go:56" INFO[0000] Running `eksctl version` ... filename="utils/awsutil.go:54" INFO[0000] output: [â„¹] version.Info{BuiltAt:"", GitCommit:"", GitTag:"0.5.3"} filename="utils/awsutil.go:62" INFO[0000] **************************************************************** Notice anonymous usage reporting enabled using spartakus To disable it If you have already deployed it run the following commands: cd $(pwd) kubectl -n ${K8S_NAMESPACE} delete deploy -l app=spartakus
For more info: https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/other-guides/usage-reporting/ **************************************************************** filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:120" INFO[0000] Creating directory /tmp/.cache filename="kfconfig/types.go:435" INFO[0000] Fetching https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/archive/v0.7-branch/head.tar.gz to /tmp/.cache/manifests filename="kfconfig/types.go:483" INFO[0003] Fetch succeeded; LocalPath /tmp/.cache/manifests/manifests-0.7-branch filename="kfconfig/types.go:510" INFO[0004] Caller ARN Info: { Account: "348134392524", Arn: "arn:aws:iam::xx:user/eks-dev", UserId: "xxxxx" } filename="utils/awsutil.go:38" Error: failed to build kfApp from URI /tmp/kfctl_aws.yaml: couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Generate failed for aws: (kubeflow.error): Code 404 with message: aws set aws plugin defaults Error Missing plugin aws Usage: kfctl apply [all(=default)|k8s|platform] [flags]
Flags: -f, --file string Static config file to use. Can be either a local path or a URL. For example: --file=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/master/bootstrap/config/kfctl_platform_existing.yaml --file=kfctl_platform_gcp.yaml -h, --help help for apply -V, --verbose verbose output default is false
failed to build kfApp from URI /tmp/kfctl_aws.yaml: couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Generate failed for aws: (kubeflow.error): Code 404 with message: aws set aws plugin defaults Error Missing plugin aws </denchmark-code>
Check the code
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/apis/apps/kfconfig/types.go
Lines 217 to 219 in ad0893e
if p.Kind != pluginKind {
continue
}
In aws.go, we still pass aws
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/aws/aws.go
Line 100 in ad0893e
err := aws.kfDef.GetPluginSpec(AwsPluginName, awsPluginSpec)
Use value here instead,
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/apis/apps/kfconfig/types.go
Line 178 in ad0893e
AWS_PLUGIN_KIND PluginKindType = "KfAwsPlugin"
What did you expect to happen: apply command go through Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): master Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) aws Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): 1.14.7
